title: Did Donald Trump Take $150K from the 9/11 Small Business Fund?
subtitle: A 2006 New York Daily News article about Donald Trump's receipt of $150,000 in federal aid post-9/11 was inaccurately revisited in 2016.
author: Snopes Staff
vclaim: Donald Trump improperly received $150,000 in federal aid earmarked for small businesses damaged by the 9/11 attacks, despite the fact his business was neither small nor damaged in the attacks.
